samples.context: Nina wanted to become more fit. She knew that if she started a new workout routine, over time she would become stronger as her muscles developed. She realized that if the workout became easy, it would not be challenging enough anymore. Nina understood that if the workout was not challenging, she would have to increase the intensity to see continued progress.
samples.question: If Nina starts a new workout routine, does she increase the intensity?

samples.context: Jeff's alarm did not go off one morning, making him late to wake up. He knew that if he missed the bus, he would have to take a taxi instead. And if he had to take a taxi, his transportation costs for the month would go up. Jeff realized that if his transportation costs rose, it would put a strain on his monthly budget.
samples.question: If Jeff misses the bus to work, does his monthly budget feel strained?

samples.context: Jessica needs medication to manage her ongoing health condition. However, she recently was thinking of stopping taking her prescribed medication. She knows that if she stops taking it, her debilitating symptoms will return. And if her symptoms return, she will become unable to work at her job. Jessica understands that if she cannot work, her finances will take a hit.
samples.question: If Jessica stops taking her medication, do her finances suffer?

samples.context: Lucy had been feeling exhausted lately. She realized it may be because she wasn't getting enough sleep at night. Lucy knew that if she didn't get enough sleep, she would feel tired during the day. When she felt tired during the day, her productivity at work would decrease. She understood that if her productivity decreased, she would probably need to take a nap after work.
samples.question: If Lucy doesn't get enough sleep, does she take a nap after work?

samples.context: Emily had wanted a puppy for so long. She knew that if she got a puppy, she would have to play with it daily. By playing with the puppy daily, it would get well exercised. Emily was well aware that a well exercised puppy is usually a healthy puppy.
samples.question: If Emily gets a puppy, is the puppy healthy?

samples.context: Liz was dedicated to practicing her music every single day. She knew that if she practiced daily, she would improve her skills as a musician. After improving steadily, she got invited to audition for a local band. If she becomes quite skilled, she will earn a spot to join the band. She was excited that if she joined the band, they would start playing gigs all around town.
samples.question: If Liz practices music every day, does she start playing gigs around town?

samples.context: A city decided to build some new public parks in certain neighborhoods. The city knew that if it built nice new parks, more residents would start using them. With more people enjoying the parks, property values around them would increase. The city understood that if property values went up, it would end up generating higher tax revenue from those areas.
samples.question: If the city builds new parks, does it generate higher tax revenue?

samples.context: Mark decided he wanted to get in better shape. He knew that if he started eating a healthy diet, he would have more energy throughout the day. With this extra energy, he would feel motivated to exercise regularly. If Mark felt motivated to exercise regularly, he could lose weight over time.
samples.question: If Mark eats a healthy diet, does he lose weight?

samples.context: Sam had always dreamed of exploring outer space. He decided to study astronomy to learn more about the solar system. Sam knew that if he studied astronomy well, he would have a deep understanding of the the planets and stars. With strong knowledge of space, he could get accepted into NASA's space program. Sam realized that getting to work at NASA would allow him to live his dream.
samples.question: If Sam studies astronomy well, does he live his dream of space exploration?

samples.context: Mark owns a small business. He decided to invest in some new software to help manage operations. He knew that if he purchased the software, his team would need to learn how to use it properly. Mark realized that once his team learned the software, it would make them more productive. He understood that if their productivity increased, his business's profits would also likely improve.
samples.question: If Mark purchases new software, do profits improve?

samples.context: Amy was determined to become a better basketball player. She knew that if she practiced regularly, she would improve her skills. With improved skills, she would perform well during games. Amy realized that if she played well during games, her team would end up winning more matches.
samples.question: If Amy practices basketball regularly, does her team win more matches?

samples.context: Lily loves animals and started volunteering at the local animal shelter. She knew that if she volunteered, she would gain experience working with rescue dogs. After seeing how well Lily did, the shelter staff would ask her to foster dogs temporarily. From fostering, Lily would realize that she could provide a forever home for one of the dogs by adopting it herself.
samples.question: If Lily volunteers at the animal shelter, does she adopt one of her foster dogs?

samples.context: Looking to meet people, Ashley decided to try out a new hobby. She realized that if she put herself out there and tried something new, she would inevitably meet new people. As she got to know some of the people through her new hobby, Ashley ended up making a few close friends. She was happy that making new friends meant her overall social circle was growing larger.
samples.question: If Ashley tries a new hobby, does her social circle grow?

samples.context: It was monsoon season and the city could get heavy rainfall daily. The authorities knew that if the city gets heavy rainfall, the reservoirs would start filling up. And if the reservoirs kept filling up, then the risk of flooding would rise. The authorities had learned that if the risk of flooding rises, they need to issue flood warnings to the residents.
samples.question: If the city gets heavy rainfall, does the city issue flood warnings?

samples.context: James started a garden in his backyard. He learned that if he waters his plants daily, they will grow healthy and strong. When the plants are robust, they end up producing more flowers and vegetables. James understood that if his plants produced more yields, his garden would become plentiful.
samples.question: If James waters his plants daily, does he have a plentiful garden?
